Pradeep Kumar Prasad
Software Engineer in Pune, Infosys

About Me

I am currently working as a software engineer in Infosys. While I'm a full-stack developer, my interest also lies in building games ,working on Js frameworks, Automation and Data Structure & Algorithm.

I love building things. While hard engineering problems are often intrinsically fun to tackle, I'm most attracted to solving real customer problems with a business justification.

Interests

Projects and Internship

Covid 19 ChatBot
  • Built a ChatBot for getting covid19 related info on my whatsapp using the twilio Api for Whatsapp and the flask framework for Python
    • Demo

Animal Sound Classification ( Jan 2019 - March 2019 )
  • We investigated the problem of animal sound classification using machine learning & deep learning.
  • We proposed a system based on different Machine Learning Models like gradient Boosting, SVM and various Deep learning models like.
  • Sound files were pre-processed to extract Mel Frequency Cepstral Coefficients(MFCC) using Librosa library.
  • The best accuracy of 93% was obtained by sequential Model of CNN and LSTM.
    • Demo

Internship (Infosys) ( May 2018 - July 2019 )
  • Worked on Java Spring Boot, Javascript, Ajax, Mockito for the developement and testing of various module required in the Project named Navigate for Me.
  • Made a software using Js which automated some of manual work by converting execl into required Json file Demo

Internship (NITRR) ( May 2017 - June 2017 )
  • Designed and Developed the complete Website of NIT Raipur. Responsible for entire UI and Backend of the website
  • Implemented own CMS using PHP
